## strings.Base64Encoded.(constructor)

WARNING: Since many strings are accidentally decodable as base64, this matcher is best combined with a more restrictive string matcher (eg `StringifiedJson`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(child: AnyMatcherOrData);
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                | Description                                                      |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| child     | [AnyMatcherOrData](./test-equivalence-matchers.anymatcherordata.md) | The string or string matcher that would match the decoded string |
